a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rates from different causes in the United States over the 20th

Reported annual death rate, based on the
underlying cause
listed on
death certificates
. This is shown as a crude rate per
100,000 people so it does not account for changes in the age structure of the population.
Data source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Note: Data for specific causes may be missing or transient if they enter or fall out of the top 10 reported causes of deaths in any year.
